notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: KMM designed the study, searched articles for reviewing and prepared the manuscript for publication. LM searched articles, read and critically revised the manuscript for publication. RW searched articles for reviewing and read the manuscript for publication. FKL searched articles, participated in developing the maps, critically read the manuscript for publication. GM read critically the manuscript for publication. SK participated in the study design, searched articles for reviewing. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
